markdown.markdown: ```{r packages, include = FALSE} library(tidyverse) library(kableExtra) library(fontawesome) ``` ```{r, include = FALSE} schedule <- tibble( DATE = c("DAY 1"), TITLE = c("Introduction and set up"), CONTENT = c("index.html"), EXAMPLE = c(""), ASSIGNMENT = c("") ) |> mutate( CONTENT = if_else(CONTENT != "", paste0("", as.character(fa("book")), ""), as.character(fa("book"))), EXAMPLE = if_else(EXAMPLE != "", paste0("", as.character(fa("gears")), ""), as.character(fa("gears"))), ASSIGNMENT = if_else(ASSIGNMENT != "", paste0("", as.character(fa("pen-ruler")), ""), as.character(fa("pen-ruler"))) ) ``` ```{r schedule, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"} schedule |> kbl(escape = FALSE, align = "llccc") |> kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "responsive"), fixed_thead = T) |> column_spec(1, width = "10%", extra_css = "padding-right: 20px;") |> column_spec(2, width = "60%") |> column_spec(3, width = "10%") |> column_spec(4, width = "10%") |> column_spec(5, width = "10%") ```

instructor.name: Harriet Goers
instructor.contact_policy: E-mail and Slack are the best ways to get in contact with me. I will try to respond to all course-related e-mails and Slack messages within 24 hours.
